WorkItem.ClosedComment: Unable to reproduce, it works fine when I load the character via XML or armory.
WorkItem.Description:
The listed stats for items in TankDK are missing the socket bonus, even though socket bonuses are there and are fulfilled by gem requirements.
 
Steps to reproduce:
Load from Armory: "Wyntyr" from "Sisters of Elune" server
Mouse over the helm: "Faceplate of the Honorbound"
With a Meta and Yellow Gem (correct gemming) there is no socket bonus given.
 
Additional Info:
Version: unknown - web-browser version (can't find version number...)
Browser: Firefox 3.6.3 for Mac (OS 10.6.3)

Comments.Message: First and foremost have you tried updating item from armoury and/or wowhead as per troubleshooting/FAQ postings and other similar issues in tracker /discussion board. (and no, I am not going to DL your file to see if it fixes your problem for you)

Thanks, but that only applies to Rawr2; Rawr3 doesn't have those features yet, Brituck.

The problem is that the default item cache in Rawr3 is rather out of date.
aahh should have caught that on the browser staement. My Bad.

1) Does your issue persist in the new Rawr3 version recently posted?
2) (Conditional as Yes to 1) Is this specific to TankDK or was it just that you only tested it with TankDK
